name: Paint Rider 2
description:
Introducing the sequel to Paint Rider!

Use the space bar to get airborne with paint!

Don't run out of paint! Go fast with speed boosts! Get extra points from stars! Get ready to rock out after hitting the music note!

Source code: https://github.com/FigyTuna/PaintRider2

License: GPL3

Software used: Godot, Krita, Audacity, LMMS, Ardour, sfxr

Credits:

Game by FigyTuna
Art by nicoleperson
Live music written and composed by nicoleperson and Arjuna Duran, guitar by Arjuna Duran, drums by FigyTuna
Digital music arrangement by FigyTuna
Highscore font: Connection Bold (OFL)
